title: words against strangers
description: one random person a day gets the chance to play against the internet in a game of words.
byline: created by The Pudding. more specifically, by russell goldenberg and michelle mcghee, with design from shannon lin.
source: data from the COCA corpus, nwl 2020 scrabble dictionary, and datamuse.
other: inquiries about purchasing ownership of the game for $1 million may be sent to wordsagainststrangers@pudding.cool (serious offers only please).
